task.title: Vegan Alternative to Bacon-Egg Grilled Cheese
task.shortdesc: I found a great recipe for bacon-egg grilled cheese, but it doesn't work for vegans. Here's a great alternative.

ul.li: 3 tsp. vegan margarine, room temperature, divided
4 slices of whole wheat or white bread

step.cmd: Beat soy milk, salt and pepper in small bowl until blended
Heat 1 tsp. vegan margarine in large nonstick skillet over medium heat until hot
Remove from pan and clean skillet
Spread remaining 2 tsp. vegan margarine evenly on one side of each bread slice
Place 2 slices in skillet, buttered side down
Top evenly with vegan cheese and tofu
Cover with remaining bread, buttered side up
Cook sandwiches over medium heat, turning once, until bread is toasted and cheese is melted, 2 to 4 minutes
